argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rdgsucmpt2.1 | |- F = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |
| 2 |  | rdgsucmpt2.2 | |- ( y = x -> E = C ) |
| 3 |  | rdgsucmpt2.3 | |- ( y = ( F ` B ) -> E = D ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ y A |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ y B |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ y D |
| 7 | 2 | #P_cbvmptv | |- ( y e. _V |-> E ) = ( x e. _V |-> C ) |
| 8 |  | #P_rdgeq1 | |- ( ( y e. _V |-> E ) = ( x e. _V |-> C ) -> rec ( ( y e. _V |-> E ) , A ) = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- rec ( ( y e. _V |-> E ) , A ) = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqtr4i | |- F = rec ( ( y e. _V |-> E ) , A ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 6, 10, 3 | #P_rdgsucmptf | |- ( ( B e. On /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) |
